reviews.review:
So I bought this game a long time ago, only recently been playing it as I can play with friends during the free weekend.

The problem with the game is the balance, if you're premade survivor only and all beginners, matchmaking is broken and we never once managed to get a lower rank than 17 killer, one time we had a rank 7 killer (20 is lowest, us, 1 is highest). 

Game was a lot better in custom mode when we had 5 players, since one of us could be the player, but some maps are hopelessly broken where the killer can easily patrol the last two/three generators (stranger things high school map) with no chance of one finishing fixing it. 

This game is either killer completely stomps survivors or a case of killer is just stuck running after everyone if they are countered due to insufficient perks. This game needs a serious look at balance, old maps are fine, but new maps are just bad, while the kits can vary wildly in strength depending on what map you get.

The only experience you will have in this game is either of these 2; You will get tunneled then camped OR you will not see the killer for the entire game which 95% of the time never happens. If you're looking for a fun experience, you will have better luck with any other game on the Steam market.

Muito bom, jogabilidade ótima,gráficos bonitos e muito bem otimizado. O problema e seu matchmaking que demora muito se vc for nível baixo
Great game! Loads of fun among friends screaming adrenaline rush.

Idk man, when I tried this game for my 1st time I had a problem 'cause in mp I was caught first in 5 match in a row. It was annoying, so I decided to uninstall it. Fast forward, after some hours, I installed it again 'cause the idea of this game is nice and also I calmed down. One of my friends bought it before me and he enjoyed it so much. I bought the game in the last. The price I paid for it was 8 euros. I bought it 'cause it's creating a great environment to play with friends (custom or mp). So, after all these I recommend it if you have friends to play with or if you want to make friends, if you enjoy horror games and suspense moments.

Дорогие разработчики, пофиксите баланс пожалуйста, это не реально, играешь 14-15 ранг против 2-5 рангов, где смысл игры? хардкор только хардкор? За маньяка игра ищется минут 5-10, за выжившего секунд за 20, в чем прикол?Слишком сильный имбаланс, одним маньяком всех вешаешь просто и легко, другим даже догнать кого не можешь, а он прокаченный в хлам 2 ранг, а ты медсестра 10 уровня и 14 ранг, как мне его догнать? 
С одной стороны играть весело, с другой очень топорно играть, когда баланса нету, вечный рандом непонятный.

Хорошая игра, очень интересно играть в игру даже в соло, атмосфера хоррора присутствует. Тут можно обкекаться и от маньяка и от выжившего, а чувство после победы просто великолепно. Советую всем попробовать поиграть. С друзьями игра становится веселее, но теряется былое напряжение. Большое количество DLC может хорошо разнообразить ваш геймплей.
[h1]Плюсы: [/h1]
- Интересные механики.
- Наличие нужной атмосферы.
- Красивая картинка.
- Отличный геймплей.
[h1]Минуcы: [/h1]
- Оптимизация.(В какой-то момент стали появляться фризы)
[h1]Оценка 8/10[/h1]
Best game if u wanna have fun
finally i know what the orderlies feel like when i dont take my meds

This is a horrid game.

Sure the Game play, characters and ambient environment are nice. If that's what you buy a game for, its for you.

Actually playing the game as a survivor? Just no. Some monsters are so over powered, there is literally no point playing a survivor. You get put in a match with people at stupidly higher levels than you and they have all their abilities unlocked and you just get destroyed.

If they halved the amount of Hooks there are in the map, there might just be a point to struggling when you have been picked up by the monster...alas, they haven't and there is no point struggling when you are always 10ft from a hook at any given time.

Then we get to some of the abilities.... If you are a content creator and add monster abilities that literally show everyone on the map, or monster abilities that diminish abilities of the players, or give a monster extended reach AND a chainsaw..... you are the monster...

If you want to keep your sanity, don't get this game. My experience has been a bad one.

10/10 would reccomend

What is dead by daylight...i myself have 800+ Hours in this game, and oh boy...i am gonna be honest. It is great, otherwise i wouldnt have put so much time in it, while it sucks the most major ass existing in this world, as survivor your only way of having yourself go against the killer are pallets and a flashlight, which are most likely wasted by multiple players, a few certain perks which can help fend the killers off a lil longer but most likely wont avoid being hanged and your own abilities too or maybe, it depends on the killers perks, hide and heal up if he caught you once. there are perks of the survivors that let them escape from the fogs grasps once and that is basically it, watch your friends be camped by a killer almost every second game and you got the survivor side of this experience. as for the killer, it really isnt as easy unless you camp, if you actually try to play fair (Yes lol if that would ever happen) then you get to have a very fun experience with the many abilities all of those creatures of the fog have got to offer, or you know, just get T-bagged if you play like an asshole. you got your perks which have many great abilities combined with your many items while the survivors get to wait for their impending doom whenever a dwight touches a gen to reveal his position to the killer. All in all, it is quite a fair games when it comes to MOST abilities leaving out about 30% of the killer abilities Cough cough Nurse, Pyramide head, Leatherfac, hag and spirit, that was a long coughing and survivor perks which categorize as "Toxic bullshit cause the killer cant be op" or flashlights but lets be honest whenever any of us play surv and get to play with a flashlight who wouldnt be an asshole and try to blind the killer a few times atleast before being hanged with a laugh on our face. I myself would NOT Recommend this game to anyone tho, it is really frustrating at times as the killer can be a real pain in the ass or just be a huge cockblock by deciding to camp every survivor he is able to catch, same goes for the survivors tho, if multiple people are good at the game and decide to just bully the killer all game it can be a very...tremendous experience let me tell you. Thanks for the time to read this one and have a nice day.
